name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Basic Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to fluid dynamics and aerodynamics principles.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory
lessons.description: Understanding airfoil shapes and their aerodynamic properties.

lessons.name: Forces on an Aircraft
lessons.description: Analysis of lift, drag, and thrust forces in aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Characteristics and behaviors of subsonic flow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Understanding shock waves and high-speed aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Transonic and Hypersonic Regimes
lessons.description: Exploring the transition from subsonic to supersonic speeds and beyond.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding conduction, convection, and radiation in aerospace environments.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Materials and design considerations for protecting spacecraft from heat.

lessons.name: Reentry Heating
lessons.description: Analyzing the heating effects during atmospheric reentry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Common materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Load and Stress Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding forces acting on spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Lightweight Structural Design
lessons.description: Optimizing spacecraft structures for weight reduction.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Elements
lessons.description: Understanding the fundamental parameters of an orbit.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers and Maneuvers
lessons.description: Exploring Hohmann transfers and other orbital maneuvers.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: Planning space missions based on orbital mechanics principles.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power and Thermal Systems
lessons.description: Design and management of spacecraft power and thermal systems.

lessons.name: Communication and Control Systems
lessons.description: Understanding spacecraft communication and attitude control systems.

lessons.name: System Integration and Testing
lessons.description: Ensuring proper integration and testing of spacecraft systems.

name: Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry
description: Introduction to organic compounds and their reactions.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons and Functional Groups
lessons.description: Understanding hydrocarbons and key functional groups in organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Exploring isomerism and three-dimensional molecular structures.

lessons.name: Organic Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Studying reaction pathways and mechanisms in organic chemistry.

name: Inorganic Chemistry Principles
description: Exploring coordination chemistry and bonding theories.
